text: Peue hana taeu jikheun teuseubeh Dumpeue cit jadeh jipujoe Allah Soe nyang di langot ngon nyang di bumoe Bandum sinaroe pujoe di babah Cicem dum jipo meubareh-bareh Bandum teuseubeh sabe di babah Bandum jiteupeue ayat seumbahyang Jipujoe Tuhan nyang Maha Murah Peue nyang jipeubuet Tuhan Neuteupeue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah
